verbose_text: Gram negative bacillus, which produces green pigment (fluorescin) and blue pigment (pyocyanin) and exotoxin A Mechanism : Exotoxin A functions just like diphtheria 's toxin (inhibits EF2) Clinical picture :P neumonia : Mainly in immunocompromised and cystic fibrosis patients Endocarditis : Mainly in IV drug abusers, targeting the tricuspid valve.
